Title: Organ Grinder
Plot: As Portland?s homeless youth start to go missing, Nick uncovers a deadly black market supplying the Grimm world with human organs for all types of elixirs. As the investigation heightens, Nick and Juliette befriend a pair of homeless siblings, Hanson and Gracie, whose friends have gone missing.
GuestStars: Valerie Cruz, Sharon Sachs, Daryl Sabara, Hannah Marks
